H0.text: What is the distinctive colour of the soles of shoes designed by Christian Louboutin. Purple

H1.text: What is the distinctive colour of the soles of shoes designed by Christian Louboutin. Silver

H2.text: What is the distinctive colour of the soles of shoes designed by Christian Louboutin. Gold

H3.text: What is the distinctive colour of the soles of shoes designed by Christian Louboutin. Red

A4.text: The red sole is protected as a trademark in several countries.

A5.text: Christian Louboutin's red-bottom colour code is Pantone 18-1663 TPX.
